cmd.name: FileSaveAs
cmd._tip: Save the current file with a different name

cmd.name: FilePrintSetup
cmd._tip: Setup the page settings for your current printer

cmd.name: EditPasteSpecial
cmd._tip: Paste with optional filters and transformations

cmd.name: EditClearAll
cmd._tip: Clear the selected cells' formats, comments, and contents

menuitem.name: EditDelete
menuitem._tip: Remove selected cells, shifting others into their place

menuitem.name: EditDuplicateSheet
menuitem._tip: Make a copy of the current sheet

menuitem.name: InsertSheet
menuitem._tip: Insert a new sheet

menuitem.name: SheetChangeName
menuitem._tip: Rename the current sheet

menuitem.name: SheetReorder
menuitem._tip: Change the order the sheets are displayed

menuitem.name: EditDeleteSheet
menuitem._tip: Irrevocably remove an entire sheet

menuitem.name: EditSelectAll
menuitem._tip: Select all cells in the spreadsheet

menuitem.name: EditSelectRow
menuitem._tip: Select an entire row

menuitem.name: EditSelectColumn
menuitem._tip: Select an entire column

menuitem.name: EditSelectArray
menuitem._tip: Select an array of cells

menuitem.name: EditSelectDepends
menuitem._tip: Select all the cells that depend on the current edit cell

menuitem.name: EditSearchReplace
menuitem._tip: Search for some text and replace it with something else

menuitem.name: EditGoto
menuitem._tip: Jump to a specified cell

menuitem.name: EditRecalc
menuitem._tip: Recalculate the spreadsheet

menuitem.name: ViewZoom
menuitem._tip: Zoom the spreadsheet in or out

menuitem.name: ViewNewShared
menuitem._tip: Create a new shared view of the workbook

menuitem.name: ViewNewUnshared
menuitem._tip: Create a new unshared view of the workbook

menuitem.name: InsertSheet
menuitem._tip: Insert a new spreadsheet

menuitem.name: InsertRows
menuitem._tip: Insert new rows

menuitem.name: InsertColumns
menuitem._tip: Insert new columns

menuitem.name: InsertCells
menuitem._tip: Insert new cells

menuitem.name: InsertObject
menuitem._tip: Inserts a Bonobo object

menuitem.name: Define
menuitem._tip: Edit sheet and workbook names

menuitem.name: InsertComment
menuitem._tip: Edit the selected cell's comment

menuitem.name: Date
menuitem._tip: Insert the current date into the selected cell(s)

menuitem.name: Time
menuitem._tip: Insert the current time into the selected cell(s)

menuitem.name: FormatCells
menuitem._tip: Modify the formatting of the selected cells

menuitem.name: AutoFit
menuitem._tip: Ensure columns are just wide enough to display content

menuitem.name: Size
menuitem._tip: Change width of the selected columns

menuitem.name: Hide
menuitem._tip: Hide the selected columns

menuitem.name: Unhide
menuitem._tip: Make any hidden columns in the selection visible

menuitem.name: Default
menuitem._tip: Change the default column width

menuitem.name: AutoFit
menuitem._tip: Ensure rows are just tall enough to display content

menuitem.name: Size
menuitem._tip: Change height of the selected rows

menuitem.name: Hide
menuitem._tip: Hide the selected rows

menuitem.name: Unhide
menuitem._tip: Make any hidden rows in the selection visible

menuitem.name: Default
menuitem._tip: Change the default row height

menuitem.name: SheetChangeName
menuitem._tip: Edit the name of the current sheet

menuitem.name: SheetReorder
menuitem._tip: Change the order the sheets are displayed

menuitem.name: SheetDisplayFormulas
menuitem._tip: Display the value of a formula or the formula itself

menuitem.name: SheetHideZeros
menuitem._tip: Toggle whether or not to display zeros as blanks

menuitem.name: SheetHideGridlines
menuitem._tip: Toggle whether or not to display gridlines

menuitem.name: SheetHideColHeader
menuitem._tip: Toggle whether or not to display column headers

menuitem.name: SheetHideRowHeader
menuitem._tip: Toggle whether or not to display row headers

menuitem.name: FormatAuto
menuitem._tip: Format a region of cells according to a pre-defined template

menuitem.name: FormatWorkbook
menuitem._tip: Modify the workbook attributes

menuitem.name: ToolsPlugins
menuitem._tip: Manage available plugin modules

menuitem.name: ToolsAutoCorrect
menuitem._tip: Automatically perform simple spell checking

menuitem.name: ToolsAutoSave
menuitem._tip: Automatically save the current document at regular intervals

menuitem.name: ToolsGoalSeek
menuitem._tip: Iteratively recalculate to find a target value

menuitem.name: ToolsSolver
menuitem._tip: Iteratively recalculate with constraints to approach a target value

menuitem.name: ToolsDataAnalysis
menuitem._tip: Statistical methods

menuitem.name: DataSort
menuitem._tip: Sort the selected cells

menuitem.name: DataFilter
menuitem._tip: Filter data with given criteria

toolitem.name: Cut
toolitem._tip: Mark the current selection for movement

toolitem.name: Copy
toolitem._tip: Copy the current selection to the clipboard

toolitem.name: Paste
toolitem._tip: Paste the contents of the clipboard or cut buffer

toolitem.name: FunctionGuru
toolitem._tip: Edit a formula in the current cell

toolitem.name: SortAscending
toolitem._tip: Sort the selected region in ascending order based on the first column selected

toolitem.name: SortDescending
toolitem._tip: Sort the selected region in descending order based on the first column selected

toolitem.name: GraphGuru
toolitem._tip: Invoke the graph guru to create a graph

toolitem.name: InsertComponent
toolitem._tip: Insert an object into the spreadsheet

toolitem.name: InsertShapedComponent
toolitem._tip: Insert a shaped component into the spreadsheet

control.name: SheetZoom
control._tip: Zoom the spreadsheet in or out

toolitem.name: Left
toolitem._tip: Left justifies the contents of each cell

toolitem.name: Center
toolitem._tip: Centers the text in each selection

toolitem.name: Right
toolitem._tip: Right justifies the contents of each cell

toolitem.name: Money
toolitem._tip: Format the selected cells as money

toolitem.name: Percent
toolitem._tip: Format the selected cells as percentages

toolitem.name: Thousands
toolitem._tip: Includes a thousands seperator in the selected cells

toolitem.name: IncreasePrecision
toolitem._tip: Increase the preceision of the selected cells

toolitem.name: DecreasePrecision
toolitem._tip: Decrease the preceision of the selected cells
